Information.p: The terms are used for the CITS 3DHM

Entry.Definition: Documentation of the evaluative, analytical, deductive, interpretative and creative decisions made in the course of computer-based recorded in such a way that the relationship between research sources, implicit knowledge, explicit reasoning, and visualisation-based outcomes can be understood.
Documentation that supports Authentication processes in the Validation or Verification of the content data such as process documents, Validation Properties Rules Data or Data Quality Rules.
Documentation other than Authentication Documentation included in the root or representation documentation folders.
The file group or structural division contains Paradata Documentation
The file group or structural division contains Authentication Documentation
The file group or structural division contains Other Documentation
